citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2-230 pm on
October 11,2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by telephone, at the gate, and knocking at
neighbor's door. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the
AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2-230 pm on 
October 11,2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by telephone, at the gate, and knocking at 
neighbor's door. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the 
AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
